timeline.message: [FLINK-19890][table][fs-connector] Introduce LimitableBulkFormat to wrap BulkFormat when limit pushed down

timeline.bodyText: Don't we need to synchronize on the initialization here, if numRead can be accessed concurrently?
timeline.author: lirui-apache

replies.bodyText: readBatch will init this variable. in a single thread.

replies.bodyText: If the init can only happen in readBatch, I think it's better to move it to readBatch. And other code can directly use numRead.
replies.author: lirui-apache

replies.bodyText: I made LimitableReader as a static class, then make the logic more clear.
replies.author: JingsongLi
